Posterior variance checks (dispersal & coralseed models) Example i) : Mermaid Bay, Lizard Island Example ii) : Palfrey North, Lizard Island Example iii): Spawn Hub, Lizard Island Example iv): Watsons Bay North, Lizard Island Example v) : Clam Garden, Lizard Island Writing Vignette with the 'minidown' Package

    Example iv): Watsons Bay North, Lizard Island

    George Roff

    2023-09-23

    10-coralseed-watsons.Rmd

    Example coralseed scenario from Watsons North, an sheltered forereef site at Lizard Island (nGBR), December 2022. The model simulates a point source release of 1000 particles from a 5*5m area within the site across a 6.95hrs period.

    Select layers using the legend and use the [ ] button to enter full screen.

    Show Code

    library(coralseed)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)

seascape <- seascape_probability(reefoutline=reef_map, habitat=benthic_map)

particles <- seed_particles(example="watson", seascape=seascape,
                            limit_time=6.95, competency.function = "exponential", 
                            limit.time = 720, simulate.mortality = "typeI", 
                            simulate.mortality.n = 0.1, probability="additive",
                            return.plot=FALSE, silent=TRUE)

settlers <-  settle_particles(particles, probability="additive", silent=TRUE)

map_coralseed(seed_particles=particles, settle_particles=settlers, 
              seascape_probability=seascape, restoration.plot=c(100,100))
